name: @peaceroad/markdown-it-math-tex-to-mathml
description: convert TeX-formatted math expressions (inline $...$ and block $$...$$) in Markdown to MathML.
author: peaceroad <peaceroad@gmail.com>

scripts.test: node test/test.js && node test/svg-font-name.test.js && node test/svg-font-packages.test.js && node test/mathml-class-map.test.js
